Config Parser¶

Module responsible for collecting and checking data form config files

class config_parser.Analysis_Config(json_file, run_id)¶

Type of run that performed ‘MAPPING’ and ‘COUNTING’ stages without QC and trimming

class config_parser.Complete_Analysis_Config(json_file, run_id)¶
check_config_specific_variables()¶

Checks variables specific for particular config file type eg. correct type

class config_parser.Config_Parser(json_file, run_id)¶

Object resposnible for checking and collecting data form config file

check_all_stages_presence()¶

Checks if there are any missing stages

Raises

KeyError – there are missing steps in contig files

abstract check_config_specific_variables()¶

Checks variables specific for particular config file type eg. correct type

check_global_config_variables()¶

Checks if provided global config parameters (that are avaliable for all config file) exist are are correct

Raises

  • ValueError – No input files

  • KeyError – There are missing config parameters in config file

check_if_proper_tool_for_stage()¶

Checks if there are any if tools are asigned to stage properly

Raises

KeyError – provided assigned to stage is tool is not available

get_config_variable(variable)¶

return value of variable in config data

Parameters

variable (str) – variable name eg seq_type

Returns

var_value - value assigned to ‘variable’

get_tool_for_stage(stage)¶

Returns tool with parameters for stage

Parameters

stage (str) – stage name eg ‘MAPPING’

Returns

tool, tool_param - that is name of tool used for provided stage and parameters

Return type

tuple

class config_parser.Sequence_Prefiltering_Config(json_file, run_id)¶

Type of run that performed only QC and trimming

check_config_specific_variables()¶

Checks variables specific for particular config file type eg. correct type
